extensionDescription.message: A browser extension that autocompletes Google's search operators

googleOperators_exclude.message: Exclude specific word from your search

googleOperators_wildcard.message: Search for wildcards or unknown words

googleOperators_rangeOfNumbers.message: Search within a range of numbers

googleOperators_around.message: Search for where the two phrases are within n words of each other

googleOperators_excludeSite.message: Exclude specific site from your search

googleOperators_related.message: Search for related sites of the URL

googleOperators_cache.message: See Googleâ€™s cached version of a site

googleOperators_link.message: Search for pages that point to that URL

googleOperators_filetype.message: Search for a specific file extension

googleOperators_intitle.message: Search for pages contains the term in the title

googleOperators_allintitle.message: Search for pages contains all the terms in the title

googleOperators_inurl.message: Search for pages contains the term in the URL

googleOperators_allinurl.message: Search for pages contains all the terms in the URL

googleOperators_intext.message: Search for pages contains the term in the text

googleOperators_allintext.message: Search for pages contains all the terms in the text

googleOperators_inanchor.message: Search for pages contains the term in the anchor

googleOperators_allinanchor.message: Search for pages contains all the terms in the anchor

googleOperators_author.message: Search for pages contains term in the author

googleOperators_weather.message: Show weather forecast of the place

googleOperators_location.message: Search for articles from the location

googleOperators_define.message: Search for definition of the word

googleOperators_source.message: Search for articles from the news source
